history.narrative: Law 6-1 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-59, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 29, 1985 and February 12, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 28, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-11 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
